title: Modifying row-configuration and vermicompost application reduces intercropped peanut (Arachis hypogaea L.) yield instability and penalty in sorghum at Babile, Eastern Ethiopia
content:
Publication date: 30 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 16

Author(s): Addisu F. Ebbisa, Nigussie Dechassa, Zelalem Bekeko, Fayera Liben
